name: Movin' Millipedes
description:
Grab tasty bugs to increase your length! Avoid hitting other millipedes (or yourself)! Try to get a new length high score!

Quick prototype / programming exercise inspired by my love of Armagetron Advanced and other Snake clones. Basic idea was such: what if Snake, but without Grid? This resulted in a game somewhat like  Slither.io, but with the caveat that running into yourself is deadly. I decided to change the theme from snakes to millipedes and to redo the art with a Gameboy / Gameboy Color aesthetic, making for an interesting and fun visual style.
